Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2013 12:07AM Sallye wrote: I have similar pain in the breast which had the stereotactic biopsies and titanium clips. On the 16th sample, the biopsy hit an un numbed nerve. I just about flew off of the table and I have had pain ever since. My double mastectomy is scheduled in 3 weeks, so I am trying to deal with the pain until then. Man it hurts!
Posts.Title: titanium clip in breast.... Veryhopeful Sallye

Posts.Content: Aug 17, 2013 08:03PM Sallye wrote: I am in the same position you are in. I had double mast on July 29th and I am waiting waiting waiting on the oncotype test result to know how the rest of my year will play out. Waiting is torture.
Posts.Title: Oncotype test-waiting and waiting.... brown471 SpecialK
